TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextAttribute
Public Class ProxyAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IContextAttribute
type ProxyAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IContextAttribute

summary.span: 指示对象类型需要自定义代理。

span.span: Indicates that an object type requires a custom proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将当前属性应用于需要自定义代理的类型。Apply the current attribute to types that need custom proxies. 您可以使用 ProxyAttribute 类通过从 ProxyAttribute 派生`new`并`New`将`ContextBoundObject`属性放置在的子级上来截获 (在 Visual Basic) 语句中。You can use the ProxyAttribute class to intercept the `new` (`New` in Visual Basic) statement by deriving from the ProxyAttribute and placing the attribute on a child of `ContextBoundObject`. (不支持将代理属性放置在的`MarshalByRefObject`子级上。)(Placing the proxy attribute on a child of `MarshalByRefObject` is not supported.) > [!NOTE] > 此类在类级别建立链接要求和继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 当直接调用方或派生类没有基础结构权限时,将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息, 请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#11)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#11)]

permission.span: 用于处理基础结构代码。

summary.span: 或者创建未初始化的 ，或者创建透明代理，具体取决于指定类型是否可以存在于当前上下文中。

span.span: Creates either an uninitialized or a transparent proxy, depending on whether the specified type can exist in the current context.

returns.span: 未初始化的 或透明代理。

span.span: An uninitialized or a transparent proxy.

public: virtual System::Runtime::Remoting::Proxies::RealProxy ^ CreateProxy(System::Runtime::Remoting::ObjRef ^ objRef, Type ^ serverType, System::Object ^ serverObject, System::Runtime::Remoting::Contexts::Context ^ serverContext);

abstract member CreateProxy : System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef * Type * obj * System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context -> System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy override this.CreateProxy : System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef * Type * obj * System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context -> System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy

span.span: The object reference to the remote object for which to create a proxy.

param.name: serverType

span.span: The type of the server where the remote object is located.

param.span: 服务器对象所在的上下文。

span.span: The context in which the server object is located.

summary.span: 创建由指定的 描述并位于服务器上的远程对象的远程处理代理的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of a remoting proxy for a remote object described by the specified , and located on the server.

returns.span: 在指定的 中说明的远程对象的远程处理代理的新实例。

span.span: The new instance of remoting proxy for the remote object that is described in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 当从引用使用特性标记的类的实例创建代理时, 将调用当前方法。The current method is called when a proxy is created out of a instance that references a class that is marked with the attribute. 因此, 仅当从调用的返回或参数接收, 或在激活客户端激活的对象期间, 才使用此方法。Therefore, the method is used only when a is received from a return or parameter on a call, or during the activation of a client-activated object. 不用于已知对象类型。The is not used for well-known object types. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#2)]
